item.title: 3 simple steps to keep your daily log 📝
item.description: For me, it is important to keep track of daily tasks I do at work. And there are loads of tools 🔧 available to help you do that. However most of the time, on your work machine / office laptop 💻, you do not have the privilege to install the tool of your choice. So here, I just wanted to share a little-known simple & neat trick 🔨, that I have been using more than a decade successfully which is built right into the Window’s default Notepad app.
